title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Drive operational excellence for modern applications (COP327)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 推动现代应用程序的卓越运营 (COP327)
abstract: Modern applications built with microservices, containers, and serverless require advanced observability practices. This session showcases how CloudWatch will help you understand your application and infrastructure as well as your business and customer experience.  Attendees will explore strategies for implementing observability in modern architectures and learn how to leverage new and existing AWS observability features to detect issues faster and reduce mean time to resolution while maintaining reliability at scale. Participants will also learn how to use these tools to accelerate deployments and break down silos between teams.
abstract_cn: 使用微服务、容器和无服务器构建的现代应用程序需要先进的可观测性实践。本次会议展示了 CloudWatch 如何帮助您了解应用程序和基础设施以及业务和客户体验。与会者将探索在现代架构中实施可观测性的策略，并学习如何利用新的和现有的 AWS 可观测性功能更快地检测问题并缩短平均解决时间，同时保持大规模的可靠性。参与者还将学习如何使用这些工具加速部署并打破团队之间的孤岛。
